Description: Students arrives at the center but does not participate in dance class even with teacher or peer encouragement
Student participates in less than half of the class
Student is present but not actively trying throughout the entire class
Student participates in warm up, recognizes change in directions, and understands number repetitions
Student participates in the entire class and noticeably demonstrates persistence when struggling
All of the above and student asks or answers questions

Student shows an extraordinary level of commitment by either practicing before/after class (self-initiated), askins questions that suggest a deeper analysis, or asking for more opportunities to practice
